title: policy enforcement
extract: Policy enforcement is an old term that is now being used to describe a variety of technical solutions. This paper defines the term ÒPolicy EnforcementÓ in the context where we want to control access to a network. Note that Òpolicy enforcementÓ could mean other things not having anything to do with networking.
extract_html: Policy enforcement is an old term that is now being used to describe a variety of technical solutions. This paper defines the term ÒPolicy EnforcementÓ in the context where we want to control access to a network. Note that Òpolicy enforcementÓ could mean other things not having anything to do with networking.
